data.comment: Alessandro Prontera starts the match. Spal with the kick-off in Ferrara.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ferrara.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Spal goal kick.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spal's half?
Alessandro Prontera awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 7, Federico Chiesa of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Spal at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Spal in their own half.
Fiorentina's Kevin Agudelo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Alessandro Prontera awards Spal a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Spal.
Spal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina attack but Dusan Vlahovic's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 13, Spal have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
Marco D`Alessandro (Spal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Spal.
Throw-in high up the field for Spal in Ferrara.
Alessandro Prontera signals a throw-in for Spal, close to Fiorentina's area.
In the minute 17, Mohamed Fares hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Spal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ferrara.
Fiorentina are pushing forward but Alfred Duncan's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Spal goal kick.
Federico Chiesa of Fiorentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Spal at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
In the minute 23, Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
Fiorentina pushes forward through Lorenzo Venuti, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Alessandro Prontera awards Spal a goal kick.
Dusan Vlahovic of Fiorentina is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 30, Goal! Alfred Duncan gives Fiorentina a 0-1 lead.
Federico Chiesa instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Spal in their own half.
In the minute 33, Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Spal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mattia Valoti for Spal who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 35, Fiorentina drive upfield and Federico Chiesa gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Spal defender.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spal in their own half.
Mattia Valoti has recovered and rejoins the match in Ferrara.
In the minute 37, Fiorentina drives forward and Alfred Duncan gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Spal.
Goal! Spal go level at 1-1 through Marco D`Alessandro in Ferrara.
In the minute 39, Mattia Valoti with an assist there.
In Ferrara Spal drive forward through Nenad Tomovic. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Spal.
In the minute 43, Alessandro Prontera signals a Spal throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Free kick for Spal in their own half.
At Stadio Paolo Mazza the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spal.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 45, Spal needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Mohamed Fares for Spal has been booked by Alessandro Prontera and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, Fiorentina kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Fiorentina's Erick Pulgar is on target but unsuccessful.
Fiorentina's Kevin Agudelo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ferrara.
Fiorentina are coming forward and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Spal have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Spal.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
In Ferrara, Kevin Agudelo of Fiorentina is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Erick Pulgar of Fiorentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
Alessandro Prontera awards Spal a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Ball goes out of play for a Spal goal kick.
In Ferrara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Spal's Mattia Valoti is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Fiorentina surge into the attack at Stadio Paolo Mazza but Dusan Vlahovic’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Spal at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, The away team replace Kevin Agudelo with Christian Kouame.
Fiorentina's Dusan Vlahovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spal defender.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 58, Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Spal territory.
Spal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 60, Fiorentina drives forward and Erick Pulgar gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Spal.
Krisztofer Horvath is replacing Jaume Cuellar Mendoza for the home team.
Dusan Vlahovic for Fiorentina is whistled offside.
In the minute 62, Gabriel Strefezza is on a sub for Alessandro Murgia for Spal.
Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ferrara.
In the minute 65, The away team have replaced Dusan Vlahovic with Patrick Cutrone. This is the second substitution made today by Giuseppe Iachini.
Riccardo Sottil is replacing Lorenzo Venuti for Fiorentina at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Fiorentina just outside Spal's area.
In the minute 68, Fiorentina push forward at Stadio Paolo Mazza and Erick Pulgar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Spal defence.
Important block from the Spal defence as Nikola Milenkovic fires in a strike for Fiorentina.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 68, Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spal in their own half.
Corner awarded to Spal.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
In the minute 71, Fiorentina pushes forward through Federico Chiesa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alessandro Prontera awards Spal a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
In the minute 75, Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spal's half?
Free kick for Spal in their own half.
The match at Stadio Paolo Mazza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mattia Valoti, who is down injured.
In the minute 77, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spal's half?
Mattia Valoti for Spal is back on the field again.
Can Spal capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 78, In Ferrara Spal attack through Krisztofer Horvath. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Patrick Cutrone of Fiorentina smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 80, Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Spal territory.
Luigi Di Biagio is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Paolo Mazza with Bartosz Salamon replacing Gabriel Strefezza.
Luigi Di Biagio (Spal) is making a fourth change, with Federico Di Francesco replacing the possibly injured Mohamed Fares.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Spal at Stadio Paolo Mazza.
In Ferrara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fiorentina's Riccardo Sottil breaks free at Stadio Paolo Mazza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 86, Spal have a goal kick.
Spal make their fifth substitution with Georgi Tunjov replacing Marco D`Alessandro.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spal.
In the minute 87, Spal's Kevin Bonifazi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
In the minute 88, Riccardo Sottil (Fiorentina) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal! Christian Kouame heads Fiorentina into a 1-2 lead.
Great play from Erick Pulgar to set up the goal.
Spal's Federico Di Francesco gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Paolo Mazza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spal in their own half.
Patrick Cutrone for Fiorentina drives towards goal at Stadio Paolo Mazza. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Alessandro Prontera will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Spal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina have been given a penalty...
The match has come to a close in Ferrara. The final score is 1-3.
At Stadio Paolo Mazza, Federico Chiesa has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! The away team extend their lead to 1-3 thanks to a penalty from Erick Pulgar.
Christian Dalle Mura is replacing Federico Chiesa for the away team.
Fiorentina make their fifth substitution with Aleksa Terzic replacing Alfred Duncan.
